Name: Lotus Mochi
Description: A sweet pastry made from rice flour, filled with a paste made from lotus seeds. Very chewy.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Una pasta dulce hecha de harina de arroz, rellena con una pasta de semillas de loto. Muy masticable.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 연꽃씨로 만든 풀로 가득 찬 쌀가루로 만든 달콤한 페이스트리. 아주 쫄깃쫄깃하다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Ein süßes Gebäck aus Reismehl, gefüllt mit einer Paste aus Lotus-Samen. Sehr zäh.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Uma massa doce feita com farinha de arroz, preenchida com uma pasta feita com sementes de lótus.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Сладкая выпечка из рисовой муки, наполненная пастой из семян лотоса. Очень тягучая.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 莲子糯米团。一种由米浆制成的甜糕点，馅料是莲子糊。非常有嚼劲。
